Title: The Ladykillers
Overview: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a band in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting landlord – a sharp old woman.
Tagline: The greatest criminal minds of all time have finally met their match.
production_companies: Mike Zoss Productions, The Jacobson Company, Touchstone Pictures
Cast: Tom Hanks, Irma P. Hall, Marlon Wayans
clean_text: ladykiller eccentric charming southern professor crew pose band order rob casino nose unsuspecting landlord – sharp old woman great criminal mind time finally meet match comedy crime thriller joel coen tom hanks irma p hall marlon wayan 2004
